name: Automation System Architecture
explanation: Automation systems control processes automatically. PLCs (Programmable Logic Controllers) execute control logic based on inputs. SCADA (Supervisory Control and Data Acquisition) monitors and controls industrial processes. Automation reduces human error, increases efficiency, and enables 24/7 operation. Used in manufacturing, power plants, and process industries. Combines sensors, controllers, and actuators.

examples.problem: What are components of an automation system?
steps: Sensors: measure process variables (temperature, pressure, etc.)

examples.solution: Consistency, efficiency, safety, 24/7 operation, data collection
steps: Improves safety (removes humans from dangerous processes)
